apple_vendor_description: This Apple-designed emoji depicts a loving couple, both rendered with a warm, medium-light skin tone, embracing with a prominent, glossy red heart floating between them. On Apple devices, the figures have soft rounded edges and a gentle 3D shading that suggests genuine affection and warmth, with subtle highlights adding to their tender connection.  Itâ€™s a versatile symbol of romance, partnership, and deep affection, often used to celebrate relationships or express heartfelt love between two individuals.
